BusinessInfinity.purpose: Perpetual, fully autonomous boardroom of legendary AI agents with strategic voting and continuous decision-making.

PossibilityDrivenAgent.purpose: Determine the overarching Possibility for a system or organization; foundational logic for purpose-driven agents.

C-Suite.purpose: Executive leadership team providing strategic direction, coordination, and business intelligence for BusinessInfinity.

Founder.purpose: Create and refine company vision, strategy, and team; drive entrepreneurship and innovation.

Investor.purpose: Provide investment analysis, portfolio management, and funding strategies for BusinessInfinity.

businessinfinity.asisaga.com.purpose: Deliver a modern web interface for business automation, agent management, and analytics.

RealmOfAgents.purpose: Foundation for building, composing, and orchestrating intelligent agents with learning, reasoning, and goal-driven behaviors.

MCP.purpose: Suite of integrations and servers for spec-driven development, data integration, and orchestration.

workspace.purpose: Defines all git modules that make up the BusinessInfinity product.

pythonPackages.purpose: Lists all Python packages and their pyproject.toml locations for the monorepo.

CHRO.purpose: Chief Human Resources Officer agent submodule.

globalDependencies.purpose: Unified dependency graph for all major modules.

integration.purpose: Strategy and entrypoints for module orchestration and integration.

refactorability.purpose: Guidelines and monorepo status for code refactoring and structure.

fileGlobs.purpose: File glob patterns for all modules.

testSuites.purpose: Test suite directory references for all modules.

sharedConfig.purpose: Shared configuration file references for all modules.

documentation.purpose: Documentation file references for all modules.

apiContracts.purpose: OpenAPI and API contract documentation for all modules.

_aiContext.purpose: Contains JSON Schema files for all configuration types. Used for validation and editor support.
Contains markdown documentation for all configuration files and the configuration changelog. Used for onboarding, reference, and AI context.
Contains example workflows and sample input files for the system. Used for demonstration and testing.
Template for required secrets and environment variables. Used for documentation and onboarding.
Provides additional documentation and module structure for AI assistants and tools. Not merged into the manifest at runtime.
Contains OpenAPI and API contract documentation for all modules. Used for AI and tooling context only.
Contains documentation file references for all modules. Used for AI and tooling context only.
Contains test suite directory references for all modules. Used for AI and tooling context only.
Contains shared configuration file references for all modules. Used for AI and tooling context only.
Contains Python package metadata for all modules. Used for AI and tooling context only.
Contains the unified dependency graph for all modules. Used for AI and tooling context only.
Contains integration strategy and entrypoints for all modules. Used for AI and tooling context only.
Contains refactorability guidelines and monorepo status. Used for AI and tooling context only.
Contains file glob patterns for all modules. Used for AI and tooling context only.
Contains the MCP (Model Context Protocol) module and all MCP submodules. Used for AI and tooling context only.
